Notes: A fan object that creates a gust of wind that can push cloud platforms created by the Cloud power-up. If Bowser Jr.'s Boomsday Machine moves over this fan, it will stop creating the gust.

Obj_arg0.Name: Wind Length
Obj_arg0.Description: The length of the wind gust. Default is 1200.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: This object will not pause its movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc.
